input.sentences: i went to a neat parade the other day and had a good time .
there were people dressed up in traditional clothing doing irish jigs .
there were people in a marching band playing great band music .
the mascot for the local high school was bringing up the rear . i bet it was hot in there !
at the end the marching band got together on the field to talk about how they could improve .
output.sentences: This parade was always a great time.
There were people dressed in traditional cultural outfits.
They play traditional music and do traditional dances
The school mascot is behind them
The school marching band plays as well.
